title: MAJOR FPS drops
body: When I'm playing I'm getting major fps drops even when I'm just walking. My frames are normally around 150-200 max settings but even when I turn it to low settings I'm still dropping from 200-30 than back to 150-30. I've tried all your suggested actions ran optimization virus scan and complete defrag as well as reinstalling. Please help I really want to play but it's unplayable currently.

replies.body: Run through this [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) for a few troubleshooting steps that can often help these fps issues. If none of that seems to be helping much, reach out to our tech team in a ticket where they can look over some recent game logs to see what's going on.
